components.text: To perform circle magic, there are three basic steps a witch must follow; drawing the correct glyphs, adding foci and lastly, activating the rite.

Every rite starts with a heart glyph, a symbol drawn with $(b)$(el:items/golden_chalk)golden chalk$(/el)$(/b).

This is the center of the rite, acting as a conduit for power and being used to activate or deactivate the magic.

After a heart glyph, rites need chalk circles, drawn using $(b)$(el:items/ritual_chalk)ritual$(/el)$(/b), $(b)$(el:items/nether_chalk)infernal$(/el)$(/b) or $(b)$(el:items/otherwhere_chalk)otherwhere$(/el)$(/b) chalk. 

Foci, such as items living sacrifices, should be placed within the circles.

When all requirements are met, the heart glyph can be activated.
